types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: Url
types.description: Common interface for internal and external urls.

fields.name: alias
fields.description: The route's path alias or canonical url if no alias is defined.

fields.name: routed
fields.description: Boolean indicating whether this is a routed (internal) path.

fields.name: path
fields.description: The route's canonical path.

types.name: Entity
types.description: Common entity interface containing generic entity properties.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^53 - 1) and 2^53 - 1 since represented in JSON as double-precision floating point numbers specifiedby [IEEE 754](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

types.name: EntityQueryResult
types.description: Wrapper type for entity query results containing the list of loaded entities and the full entity count for pagination purposes.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The menu's name.

fields.name: description
fields.description: The menu's description.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

fields.name: isLocked
fields.description: Boolean indicating if this language is locked.

fields.name: weight
fields.description: The weight of the language.

fields.name: argument
fields.description: The language id prepared as a language enum value.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The human-readable name of the language.

fields.name: direction
fields.description: The language direction (rtl or ltr).

fields.name: isDefault
fields.description: Boolean indicating if this is the configured default language.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The language id.

types.name: InternalUrl
types.description: Common interface for internal urls.

fields.name: routed
fields.description: Boolean indicating whether this is a routed (internal) path.

fields.name: path
fields.description: The route's canonical path.

fields.description: The route's path alias or canonical url if no alias is defined.

fields.name: entity
fields.description: The entity belonging to the current url.

fields.name: routed
fields.description: Boolean indicating whether this is a routed (internal) path.

fields.name: path
fields.description: The route's canonical path.

fields.name: text
fields.description: The label of a link.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The url of a link.

types.name: MenuLinkContent
types.description: The 'Custom menu link' entity type.

fields.name: entityRendered
fields.description: Renders 'Custom menu link' entities in the given view mode.

fields.name: defaultLangcode
fields.description: A flag indicating whether this is the default translation.

fields.name: changed
fields.description: The time that the menu link was last edited.

fields.name: parent
fields.description: The ID of the parent menu link plugin, or empty string when at the top level of the hierarchy.

fields.name: enabled
fields.description: A flag for whether the link should be enabled in menus or hidden.

fields.name: expanded
fields.description: If selected and this menu link has children, the menu will always appear expanded.

fields.name: weight
fields.description: Link weight among links in the same menu at the same depth. In the menu, the links with high weight will sink and links with a low weight will be positioned nearer the top.

fields.name: menuName
fields.description: The menu name. All links with the same menu name (such as "tools") are part of the same menu.

fields.name: external
fields.description: A flag to indicate if the link points to a full URL starting with a protocol, like http:// (1 = external, 0 = internal).

fields.name: link
fields.description: The location this menu link points to.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Shown when hovering over the menu link.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The text to be used for this link in the menu.

fields.name: bundle
fields.description: The content menu link bundle.

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: The content menu link UUID.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The entity ID for this menu link content entity.

fields.name: langcode
fields.description: The menu link language code.

types.name: Consumer
types.description: The 'Consumer' entity type.

fields.name: reverseClientOauth2Token
fields.description: Reverse reference: The consumer client for this Access Token.

fields.name: entityRendered
fields.description: Renders 'Consumer' entities in the given view mode.

fields.name: secret
fields.description: The secret key of this client (hashed).

fields.name: userId
fields.description: When no specific user is authenticated Drupal will use this user as the author of all the actions made.

fields.name: redirect
fields.description: The URI this client will redirect to when needed.

fields.name: roles
fields.description: The roles for this Consumer. OAuth2 scopes are implemented as Drupal roles.

fields.name: confidential
fields.description: A boolean indicating whether the client secret needs to be validated or not.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A description of the consumer. This text will be shown to the users to authorize sharing their data to create an access token.

fields.name: imageStyles
fields.description: Image styles this consumer will need. All images will provide all the variants selected here.

fields.name: thirdParty
fields.description: Mark this if the organization behind this consumer is not the same as the one behind the Drupal API.

fields.name: image
fields.description: Logo of the consumer.

fields.name: label
fields.description: The consumer label.

fields.name: ownerId
fields.description: The username of the consumer author.
